homelink: The Dude with a Thousand Faces

meta.author: Jen Blair, Sam Kennerly
meta.description: In bowling and comparative mythology, the monomyth is a template for tales and lore about a hero who goes on an adventure, runs into some things, and then comes home.
meta.keywords: monomyth, narratology, folklore, screenplay, hero, bowling, dude

title: The Dude with a Thousand Faces.
